name: Tribal Unity (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect: "Harpie" monsters are also treated as "Amazoness" monsters and vice-versa, while they are on the field or GY. Once per Duel, you can discard 1 monster to make 1 "Harpie" or "Amazoness" monster you control gain ATK equal to the Level of the discarded monster x 200.
